error.noResponseReceived: The request was made but no response was received
error.failedRequestAndResponse: Both the request and the response failed to return

httpStatusCodes.303: Redirects do not link to the requested resource itself, but to another page
httpStatusCodes.305: The resource requested by the client is only available through a proxy
httpStatusCodes.400: The server cannot or will not process the request due to what is perceived to be a client error.
httpStatusCodes.401: Unauthorized access. Try logging in again!
httpStatusCodes.402: The request cannot be processed until the customer makes a payment
httpStatusCodes.404: We were unable to find the resource you are looking for. Try again
httpStatusCodes.405: The target resource does not support the method used
httpStatusCodes.406: The server cannot produce a response that matches the list of acceptable values ​​defined in the request's proactive content negotiation headers, what's more, the server is unwilling to provide a default representation.
httpStatusCodes.407: The request was not applied because it does not have valid authentication credentials for a proxy server that is between the app and the server that can access the requested resource.
httpStatusCodes.409: There was a conflict in the request. Try again!
httpStatusCodes.410: Access to the target resource is no longer available on the source server and this condition is likely to be permanent.
httpStatusCodes.411: The server refused to accept the request without a Content-Length header set
httpStatusCodes.412: Access to the target resource is denied
httpStatusCodes.413: The request is greater than the limits defined by the server
httpStatusCodes.414: The URI requested by the client is longer than the server is willing to interpret.
httpStatusCodes.415: The server refuses to accept the request because the payload format is in an unsupported format
httpStatusCodes.416: The server cannot service the requested ranges
httpStatusCodes.417: The expectation provided in the Expect header of the request could not be met.
httpStatusCodes.418: The server refuses to process the request!
httpStatusCodes.421: The request was directed to a server that is unable to produce a response
httpStatusCodes.422: The request was well worded but could not be followed up due to errors in the form.
httpStatusCodes.424: The request failed due to a previous request failing!
httpStatusCodes.428: The origin server requires the request to be conditional!
httpStatusCodes.429: Keep calm. You are sending too many requests to the server!
httpStatusCodes.431: The server is unwilling to process the request because its header fields are too large
httpStatusCodes.451: The user agent has requested a feature that cannot legally be provided.
httpStatusCodes.501: The request method is not supported by the server and cannot be handled.
httpStatusCodes.502: The server, while working as a gateway to get a response needed to handle the request, got an invalid response.
httpStatusCodes.504: The server is acting as a gateway and cannot get a response in time.
httpStatusCodes.505: The HTTP version used in the request is not supported by the server.
httpStatusCodes.511: The client needs to authenticate to gain access to the network.
